Most_JJS of_IN the_DT two_CD dozen_NN scientists_NNS take_VB the_DT podium_NN report_VB results_NNS with_IN new_JJ ,_, more_RBR sophisticated_JJ variations_NNS of_IN the_DT seemingly_RB simple_JJ electrolysis-of-water_JJ experiments_NNS describe_VB last_JJ March_NNP by_IN Messrs._NNP Fleischmann_NNP and_CC Pons_NNP ._.
The_DT experiments_NNS involve_VB encircle_VB a_DT thin_JJ rod_NN of_IN palladium_NN metal_NN with_IN a_DT wire_NN of_IN platinum_NN and_CC plunge_VB the_DT two_CD electrodes_NNS into_IN ``_`` heavy_JJ ''_'' water_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT hydrogen_NN atoms_NNS be_VB a_DT doubly_RB heavy_JJ form_NN know_VB as_IN deuterium_NN ._.

But_CC Messrs._NNP Fleischmann_NNP and_CC Pons_NNP say_VB their_PRP$ experiments_NNS also_RB produce_VB large_JJ amounts_NNS of_IN heat_NN ._.

As_IN of_IN last_JJ weekend_NN ,_, a_DT dozen_NN labs_NNS also_RB have_VB report_VB measure_VB ``_`` excess_JJ ''_'' heat_NN from_IN similar_JJ electrolytic_JJ experiments_NNS ,_, although_IN amounts_NNS of_IN such_JJ heat_NN vary_VB widely_RB ._.
One_CD of_IN the_DT seven_CD reports_NNS present_VB here_RB of_IN excess_JJ heat_NN production_NN be_VB give_VB by_IN Richard_NNP A._NNP Oriani_NNP ,_, professor_NN of_IN chemical_NN engineering_NN at_IN the_DT University_NNP of_IN Minnesota_NNP ._.

''_''

The_DT Task_NNP Broker_NNP differ_VB from_IN other_JJ programs_NNS that_WDT spread_VB compute_VB tasks_NNS around_IN a_DT network_NN ._.
A_DT previously_RB available_JJ program_NN call_VB Network_NNP Computing_VB System_NNP ,_, develop_VB by_IN Hewlett-Packard_NNP 's_POS Apollo_NNP division_NN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, take_VB a_DT task_NN and_CC splits_NNS it_PRP up_IN into_IN parts_NNS ,_, divvying_VB up_IN those_DT parts_NNS to_TO several_JJ computers_NNS in_IN a_DT network_NN for_IN simultaneous_JJ processing_NN ._.

Dream_NNP on_NNP ._.
There_EX be_VB all_DT sorts_NNS of_IN ways_NNS to_TO give_VB buy_NN and_CC sell_VB instructions_NNS to_TO a_DT broker_NN --_: and_CC just_RB as_IN many_JJ ways_NNS to_TO get_VB burn_VB if_IN you_PRP do_VB n't_RB know_VB what_WP you_PRP 're_VB do_VB ._.
So_RB here_RB 's_VB a_DT rundown_NN of_IN the_DT most_RBS common_JJ types_NNS of_IN market_NN orders_NNS permit_VB by_IN the_DT stock_NN and_CC commodity_NN exchanges_NNS ._.
Two_CD things_NNS to_TO keep_VB in_IN mind_NN :_: Not_RB all_DT exchanges_NNS accept_VB every_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN ._.
And_CC even_RB when_WRB a_DT specific_JJ order_NN be_VB acceptable_JJ to_TO an_DT exchange_NN ,_, a_DT brokerage_NN firm_NN can_MD refuse_VB to_TO enter_VB it_PRP for_IN a_DT customer_NN ._.
Market_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT be_VB probably_RB the_DT most_RBS widely_RB use_VB order_NN --_: and_CC the_DT one_CD most_RBS open_JJ to_TO abuse_VB by_IN unscrupulous_JJ floor_NN brokers_NNS ,_, since_IN it_PRP impose_VB no_DT price_NN restrictions_NNS ._.
With_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, an_DT investor_NN tell_VB a_DT broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB ``_`` at_IN the_DT market_NN ._. ''_''
It_PRP 's_VB like_IN say_VB ,_, ``_`` get_VB me_PRP in_IN now_RB ''_'' or_CC ``_`` get_VB me_PRP out_IN now_RB ._. ''_''
For_IN example_NN ,_, if_IN wheat_NN be_VB be_VB offer_VB at_IN $_$ 4.065_CD and_CC bid_NN at_IN $_$ 4.060_CD ,_, a_DT market_NN order_NN to_TO buy_VB would_MD be_VB fill_VB at_IN the_DT higher_JJR price_NN and_CC a_DT market_NN order_NN to_TO sell_VB at_IN the_DT lower_JJR price_NN ._.
A_DT recent_JJ indictment_NN allege_VB that_IN some_DT floor_NN brokers_NNS at_IN the_DT two_CD largest_JJS Chicago_NNP commodity_NN exchanges_NNS use_VB market_NN orders_NNS to_TO fill_VB customers_NNS '_POS orders_NNS at_IN unfavorable_JJ prices_NNS by_IN arrange_VB trades_NNS with_IN fellow_NN brokers_NNS ._.
Profits_NNS realize_VB from_IN these_DT trades_NNS would_MD then_RB be_VB share_VB by_IN the_DT conspire_VB brokers_NNS ._.
Limit_VB Order_NNP :_: Limit_VB orders_NNS be_VB use_VB when_WRB investors_NNS want_VB to_TO restrict_VB the_DT amount_NN they_PRP will_MD receive_VB or_CC pay_VB for_IN an_DT investment_NN ._.
Investors_NNS do_VB this_DT by_IN specify_VB a_DT minimum_JJ price_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT investment_NN may_MD be_VB sell_VB or_CC the_DT maximum_JJ price_NN that_WDT may_MD be_VB pay_VB for_IN it_PRP ._.
Suppose_VB an_DT investor_NN want_VB to_TO sell_VB a_DT stock_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB for_IN less_JJR than_IN $_$ 55_NN ._.
A_DT limit_NN order_NN to_TO sell_VB could_MD be_VB enter_VB at_IN that_DT price_NN ._.
One_CD risk_NN :_: Investors_NNS may_MD regret_VB the_DT restriction_NN if_IN the_DT stock_NN reach_VB 54_CD and_CC then_RB fall_VB ._.
Unless_IN the_DT market_NN go_VB at_IN least_JJS one_CD tick_VB -LRB-_( the_DT smallest_JJS price_NN increment_NN permit_VB -RRB-_) beyond_IN the_DT limit_NN price_NN ,_, investors_NNS be_VB n't_RB assure_VB of_IN have_VB their_PRP$ orders_NNS fill_VB because_IN there_EX may_MD not_RB be_VB sufficient_JJ trading_NN volume_NN to_TO permit_VB fill_VB it_PRP at_IN the_DT specify_VB price_NN ._.
Stop_VB Order_NNP :_: Stop_VB orders_NNS tell_VB a_DT floor_NN broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN once_RB the_DT price_NN reach_VB a_DT certain_JJ level_NN ._.
Once_RB the_DT price_NN reach_VB that_DT level_NN ,_, a_DT stop_NN order_NN turn_VB into_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT order_NN be_VB fill_VB at_IN whatever_WDT price_VB the_DT broker_NN can_MD get_VB ._.
Stop_VB orders_NNS be_VB sometimes_RB call_VB ``_`` stop-loss_NN ''_'' orders_NNS because_IN they_PRP be_VB frequently_RB use_VB to_TO protect_VB profits_NNS or_CC limit_NN losses_NNS ._.
While_IN stop_NN orders_NNS sound_VB similar_JJ to_TO limit_VB orders_NNS ,_, there_EX be_VB a_DT difference_NN :_: Sell_VB stop_VB must_MD be_VB enter_VB at_IN a_DT price_NN below_IN the_DT current_JJ market_NN price_NN and_CC buy_VB stop_VB above_RB ._.
In_IN contrast_NN ,_, sell_VB limit_NN orders_NNS must_MD be_VB place_VB above_IN the_DT market_NN price_NN and_CC buy_VB limit_NN orders_NNS be_VB place_VB below_RB ._.
The_DT crash_NN in_IN October_NNP 1987_CD and_CC last_JJ Friday_NNP 's_POS sell-off_NN painfully_RB teach_VB some_DT investors_NNS exactly_RB what_WP stop_VB orders_NNS will_MD and_CC wo_MD n't_RB do_VB ._.
An_DT investor_NN who_WP may_MD have_VB place_VB a_DT stop-loss_NN order_NN at_IN $_$ 90_CD under_IN a_DT stock_NN that_WDT be_VB trade_VB at_IN $_$ 100_CD a_DT share_NN on_IN the_DT Friday_NNP before_IN the_DT crash_NN be_VB stun_VB to_TO discover_VB that_IN the_DT order_NN be_VB fill_VB at_IN $_$ 75_CD when_WRB the_DT stock_NN open_VB at_IN that_DT price_NN on_IN Monday_NNP ._.
Stop-Limit_NNP Order_NNP :_: Stop-limit_JJ orders_NNS turn_VB into_IN limit_NN orders_NNS when_WRB an_DT investment_NN trades_NNS at_IN the_DT price_NN specify_VB in_IN the_DT order_NN ._.
Unlike_IN stop_NN orders_NNS --_: which_WDT be_VB fill_VB at_IN the_DT market_NN price_NN when_WRB the_DT stop_NN price_NN be_VB hit_VB --_: stop-limit_JJ orders_NNS demand_VB that_IN the_DT trades_NNS be_VB make_VB only_RB at_IN the_DT specify_VB price_NN ._.
If_IN it_PRP ca_MD n't_RB be_VB make_VB at_IN that_DT price_NN ,_, it_PRP do_VB n't_RB get_VB fill_VB ._.
Investors_NNS who_WP wish_VB to_TO be_VB out_IN of_IN a_DT position_NN ,_, without_IN the_DT risk_NN of_IN receive_VB a_DT worse-than-expected_JJ price_NN from_IN a_DT market_NN order_NN ,_, may_MD use_VB this_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN to_TO specify_VB the_DT price_NN at_IN which_WDT the_DT order_NN must_MD be_VB fill_VB ._.
But_CC if_IN the_DT market_NN moves_NNS quickly_RB enough_RB ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB impossible_JJ for_IN the_DT broker_NN to_TO carry_VB out_RP the_IN order_NN because_IN the_DT investment_NN have_VB pass_VB the_DT specify_VB price_NN ._.
Market-If-Touched_NNP Order_NNP :_: Market-if-touched_JJ orders_NNS be_VB like_IN stop_NN orders_NNS in_IN that_DT they_PRP become_VB market_NN orders_NNS if_IN a_DT specify_VB price_NN be_VB reach_VB ._.
However_RB ,_, unlike_IN a_DT buy-stop_JJ order_NN ,_, a_DT buy_NN market-if-touched_NN order_NN be_VB enter_VB at_IN a_DT price_NN below_IN the_DT current_JJ price_NN ,_, while_IN a_DT sell_NN market-if-touched_NN order_NN be_VB enter_VB at_IN a_DT price_NN above_IN it_PRP ._.
As_RB soon_RB as_IN the_DT market_NN trades_NNS at_IN the_DT specify_VB price_NN the_DT floor_NN broker_NN will_MD fill_VB it_PRP at_IN the_DT best_JJS possible_JJ price_NN ._.
Fill-Or-Kill_NNP Order_NNP :_: The_DT fill-or-kill_JJ order_NN be_VB one_CD of_IN several_RB associate_VB with_IN the_DT timing_NN of_IN trades_NNS ._.
It_PRP instruct_VB a_DT broker_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN at_IN the_DT specify_VB price_NN or_CC better_JJR ._.
But_CC if_IN the_DT investment_NN ca_MD n't_RB be_VB buy_VB or_CC sell_VB immediately_RB ,_, the_DT order_NN be_VB automatically_RB cancel_VB ._.
Gregory_NNP Bessemer_NNP ,_, who_WP come_VB in_IN second_JJ in_IN the_DT stock_NN division_NN of_IN the_DT recently_RB complete_VB U.S._NNP Trading_NNP Championship_NNP ,_, say_VB he_PRP use_VB fill-or-kill_JJ orders_NNS almost_RB exclusively_RB when_WRB trading_NN options_NNS ._.
``_`` I_PRP like_VB to_TO use_VB them_PRP to_TO feel_VB out_RP the_IN market_NN ,_, ''_'' he_PRP say_VB ._.
``_`` If_IN they_PRP do_VB n't_RB fill_VB it_PRP immediately_RB ,_, then_RB I_PRP can_MD start_VB over_IN at_IN a_DT new_JJ price_NN or_CC try_VB again_RB with_IN the_DT same_JJ price_NN ._. ''_''
Not-Held_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT be_VB another_DT timing_NN order_NN ._.
It_PRP be_VB a_DT market_NN order_NN that_WDT allow_VB floor_NN brokers_NNS to_TO take_VB more_JJR time_NN to_TO buy_VB or_CC sell_VB an_DT investment_NN ,_, if_IN they_PRP think_VB they_PRP can_MD get_VB a_DT better_JJR price_NN by_IN wait_VB ._.
Not-held_JJ orders_NNS ,_, which_WDT be_VB also_RB know_VB as_IN ``_`` disregard_NN the_DT tape_NN ''_'' orders_NNS ,_, be_VB always_RB do_VB at_IN the_DT customer_NN 's_POS risk_NN ._.
One-Cancels-The-Other_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT be_VB really_RB two_CD orders_NNS in_IN one_CD ,_, generally_RB for_IN the_DT same_JJ security_NN or_CC commodity_NN ,_, instruct_VB floor_NN brokers_NNS to_TO fill_VB whichever_WDT order_VB they_PRP can_MD first_RB and_CC then_RB cancel_VB the_DT other_JJ order_NN ._.
In_IN a_DT fast-moving_JJ market_NN ,_, it_PRP prevent_VB an_DT investor_NN from_IN get_VB stick_VB with_IN have_VB make_VB two_CD trades_NNS on_IN the_DT same_JJ security_NN ._.
Specific-Time_NNP Order_NNP :_: This_DT type_NN of_IN order_NN couples_NNS many_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS describe_VB above_IN with_IN instructions_NNS that_IN the_DT order_NN must_MD be_VB carry_VB out_IN at_IN or_CC by_IN a_DT certain_JJ time_NN ._.
``_`` On_IN the_DT close_NN ''_'' can_MD be_VB add_VB to_TO many_VB types_NNS of_IN orders_NNS ._.
For_IN example_NN ,_, ``_`` market-on-close_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' must_MD be_VB fill_VB during_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ minutes_NNS of_IN trading_NN for_IN the_DT day_NN at_IN a_DT price_NN that_WDT be_VB within_IN the_DT official_NN close_VB range_NN of_IN prices_NNS as_IN determine_VB by_IN the_DT exchange_NN ._.
``_`` Stop-close-only_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' be_VB stop_VB orders_NNS that_WDT only_RB become_VB active_JJ during_IN the_DT close_VB minutes_NNS of_IN trading_NN ._.
``_`` Day_NNP orders_NNS ''_'' expire_VB at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN on_IN which_WDT they_PRP be_VB enter_VB ,_, ``_`` good-till-canceled_JJ orders_NNS ''_'' have_VB no_DT expiration_NN date_NN ._.
Most_JJS brokers_NNS assume_VB that_IN all_DT orders_NNS be_VB day_NN orders_NNS unless_IN specify_VB otherwise_RB ._.
On_IN Oct._NNP 19_CD ,_, 1987_CD ,_, some_DT investors_NNS learn_VB the_DT consequences_NNS of_IN enter_VB ``_`` good-til-canceled_JJ limit_NN orders_NNS ''_'' and_CC then_RB forget_VB about_IN them_PRP ._.
They_PRP find_VB they_PRP have_VB buy_VB stock_NN from_IN limit_NN orders_NNS that_IN they_PRP might_MD have_VB enter_VB weeks_NNS or_CC months_NNS earlier_RBR and_CC have_VB forget_VB to_TO cancel_VB ._.
It_PRP be_VB always_RB the_DT responsibility_NN of_IN investors_NNS to_TO keep_VB track_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS they_PRP have_VB place_VB ._.
Investors_NNS who_WP change_VB their_PRP$ mind_NN about_IN buy_VB or_CC sell_VB after_IN an_DT order_NN have_VB be_VB fill_VB be_VB ,_, usually_RB ,_, stick_VB with_IN the_DT consequences_NNS ._.
Mr._NNP Angrist_NNP write_VB on_IN the_DT options_NNS and_CC commodities_NNS markets_NNS for_IN The_DT Wall_NNP Street_NNP Journal_NNP ._.
IN_IN SIZING_NNP UP_IN the_DT risks_NNS of_IN stock-market_NN investments_NNS ,_, there_EX 's_VB probably_RB no_DT start_VB place_NN better_JJR than_IN ``_`` beta_NN ._. ''_''
But_CC investors_NNS better_RBR not_RB ignore_VB its_PRP$ limitations_NNS ,_, either_RB ._.
Beta_NNP be_VB a_DT handy_JJ gauge_NN that_IN measure_VB the_DT volatility_NN of_IN a_DT stock_NN or_CC stock_NN mutual_JJ fund_NN ._.
For_IN any_DT give_VB move_NN in_IN the_DT overall_JJ market_NN ,_, it_PRP suggest_VB how_WRB steeply_RB that_IN particular_JJ issue_NN might_MD rise_VB or_CC fall_NN ._.
Beta_JJ figures_NNS be_VB widely_RB available_JJ and_CC easy_JJ to_TO interpret_VB ._.
The_DT beta_NN of_IN the_DT broad_JJ market_NN ,_, typically_RB define_VB as_IN the_DT Standard_NNP &_CC Poor_NNP 's_POS 500-stock_JJ index_NN ,_, be_VB always_RB 1.0_CD ._.
So_RB a_DT stock_NN with_IN a_DT beta_NN of_IN 0.5_CD be_VB half_NN as_IN volatile_JJ ,_, one_CD at_IN 1.5_CD be_VB 50_CD %_NN more_RBR volatile_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB on_RB ._.
Cautious_JJ investors_NNS should_MD generally_RB go_VB with_IN stocks_NNS that_WDT have_VB low_JJ betas_NNS ._.
Go_VB with_IN high-beta_JJ stocks_NNS to_TO get_VB the_DT biggest_JJS payoff_NN from_IN a_DT bet_NN on_IN a_DT bull_NN market_NN ._.
Remember_VB ,_, though_RB ,_, that_DT beta_NN also_RB have_VB important_JJ limitations_NNS ._.
``_`` Beta_NNP be_VB only_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT risk_NN in_IN a_DT stock_NN ,_, ''_'' say_VB William_NNP F._NNP Sharpe_NNP ,_, the_DT Stanford_NNP University_NNP emeritus_NN professor_NN who_WP develop_VB the_DT measure_NN ._.
``_`` There_EX be_VB risk_NN that_WDT be_VB not_RB associate_VB with_IN market_NN moves_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT beta_NN do_VB n't_RB tell_VB you_PRP the_DT magnitude_NN of_IN that_DT ._. ''_''
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, beta_NN do_VB n't_RB measure_VB the_DT company_NN -_: and_CC industry-specific_JJ risk_NN associate_VB with_IN an_DT individual_JJ stock_NN ._.
That_DT ``_`` business_NN ''_'' risk_NN be_VB very_RB significant_JJ for_IN an_DT investor_NN with_IN only_RB a_DT few_JJ stocks_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP virtually_RB disappear_VB in_IN a_DT large_JJ and_CC well-diversified_JJ portfolio_NN ._.
Beta_NNP be_VB also_RB a_DT poor_JJ indicator_NN of_IN the_DT risk_NN in_IN stock_NN groups_NNS that_WDT march_VB to_TO their_PRP$ own_JJ drummer_NN ._.
In_IN particular_JJ ,_, the_DT prices_NNS of_IN gold_NN and_CC other_JJ precious-metals_NNS stocks_NNS shoot_VB up_IN and_CC down_RB ,_, but_CC the_DT stocks_NNS tend_VB to_TO have_VB low_JJ betas_NNS because_IN their_PRP$ moves_NNS be_VB not_RB market-inspired_JJ ._.
Concern_NN that_IN investors_NNS could_MD misinterpret_VB such_JJ readings_NNS lead_VB the_DT American_NNP Association_NNP of_IN Individual_JJ Investors_NNS to_TO eliminate_VB beta_NN figures_NNS for_IN precious-metals_NNS funds_NNS in_IN the_DT 1989_CD edition_NN of_IN its_PRP$ mutual-fund_JJ guide_NN ._.
``_`` Our_PRP$ fear_NN be_VB people_NNS would_MD look_VB just_RB at_IN the_DT beta_NN -LCB-_( of_IN a_DT gold_NN fund_NN -RCB-_) and_CC say_VB here_RB be_VB an_DT investment_NN with_IN very_RB low_JJ risk_NN ,_, ''_'' say_VB John_NNP Markese_NNP ,_, director_NN of_IN research_NN for_IN the_DT Chicago-based_JJ group_NN ._.
``_`` In_IN reality_NN it_PRP 's_VB very_RB volatile_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT movements_NNS be_VB not_RB because_IN of_IN market_NN movements_NNS ._.
READY_NNP TO_TO REVIEW_NNP the_DT riskiness_NN of_IN your_PRP$ investment_NN portfolio_NN ?_.
First_RB ,_, a_DT pop_NN quiz_NN ._.
When_WRB you_PRP think_VB of_IN the_DT words_NNS ``_`` risk_NN ''_'' and_CC ``_`` investment_NN ,_, ''_'' what_WP 's_VB the_DT specific_JJ peril_NN that_WDT come_VB to_TO mind_VB ?_.
Pencils_NNS down_RB ._.
If_IN you_PRP 're_VB like_IN most_RBS people_NNS ,_, you_PRP say_VB it_PRP 's_VB a_DT hold_VB that_WDT go_VB completely_RB sour_JJ --_: maybe_RB a_DT bond_NN that_IN defaults_NNS or_CC a_DT stock_NN whose_WP$ value_NN disappear_VB in_IN a_DT bankruptcy_NN proceeding_NN ._.
``_`` People_NNS tend_VB to_TO see_VB risk_NN primarily_RB on_IN that_DT one_CD dimension_NN ,_, ''_'' say_VB Timothy_NNP Kochis_NNP ,_, national_JJ director_NN of_IN personal_JJ financial_JJ planning_NN for_IN accountants_NNS Deloitte_NNP ,_, Haskins_NNP &_CC Sells_NNP ._.
But_CC therein_RB lie_VB another_DT aspect_NN of_IN investment_NN risk_NN :_: the_DT hazard_NN of_IN shape_VB your_PRP$ portfolio_NN to_TO avoid_VB one_CD or_CC more_JJR types_NNS of_IN risk_NN and_CC be_VB blind-sided_JJ by_IN others_NNS ._.
This_DT be_VB clearly_RB not_RB good_JJ news_NN to_TO all_DT you_PRP people_NNS who_WP sleep_VB like_IN babies_NNS every_DT night_NN ,_, lull_VB by_IN visions_NNS of_IN your_PRP$ money_NN sit_VB risk-free_JJ in_IN six-month_JJ CDs_NNS ._.
Risk_NN wear_VB many_JJ disguises_NNS ,_, and_CC investments_NNS that_WDT be_VB low_JJ in_IN one_CD type_NN of_IN obvious_JJ risk_NN can_MD be_VB distressingly_RB high_JJ in_IN other_JJ ,_, less_RBR obvious_JJ kinds_NNS ._.
U.S._NNP Treasury_NNP bonds_NNS ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, be_VB supersafe_NN when_WRB it_PRP come_VB to_TO return_VB money_NN at_IN maturity_NN ._.
But_CC their_PRP$ value_NN as_IN investments_NNS can_MD be_VB decimate_VB by_IN inflation_NN ,_, which_WDT erode_VB the_DT purchase_VB power_NN of_IN bonds_NNS '_POS fixed-dollar_JJ interest_NN payments_NNS ._.
Risk_NN be_VB also_RB a_DT function_NN of_IN time_NN ._.
When_WRB financial_JJ professionals_NNS measure_VB risk_NN mathematically_RB ,_, they_PRP usually_RB focus_VB on_IN the_DT volatility_NN of_IN short-term_JJ returns_NNS ._.
Stocks_NNS be_VB much_RB riskier_JJR than_IN Treasury_NNP bills_NNS ,_, for_IN example_NN ,_, because_IN the_DT range_NN in_IN performance_NN from_IN the_DT best_JJS years_NNS to_TO the_DT worst_JJS be_VB much_RB wider_JJR ._.
That_DT be_VB usually_RB measure_VB by_IN the_DT standard_JJ deviation_NN ,_, or_CC divergence_NN ,_, of_IN annual_JJ results_NNS from_IN the_DT average_JJ return_NN over_IN time_NN ._.
But_CC investors_NNS who_WP be_VB preoccupy_VB with_IN short-term_JJ fluctuations_NNS may_MD be_VB pay_VB too_RB little_JJ attention_NN to_TO another_DT big_JJ risk_NN --_: not_RB generate_VB enough_JJ money_NN to_TO meet_VB long-term_JJ financial_JJ and_CC life-style_NN goals_NNS ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, some_DT investors_NNS have_VB swear_VB off_IN stocks_NNS since_IN the_DT 1987_CD market_NN crash_NN ;_: last_JJ Friday_NNP 's_POS debacle_NN only_RB reinforce_VB those_DT feelings_NNS ._.
But_CC the_DT stock_NN market_NN ,_, despite_IN some_DT stomach-churning_JJ declines_NNS ,_, have_VB far_RB outperform_VB other_JJ securities_NNS over_IN extend_VB periods_NNS ._.
By_IN retreat_VB to_TO the_DT apparent_JJ security_NN of_IN ,_, say_VB ,_, money-market_JJ funds_NNS ,_, investors_NNS may_MD not_RB be_VB earn_VB enough_JJ investment_NN return_NN to_TO pay_VB for_IN a_DT comfortable_JJ retirement_NN ._.
``_`` That_DT 's_VB the_DT biggest_JJS risk_NN of_IN all_DT --_: the_DT risk_NN of_IN not_RB meet_VB your_PRP$ objectives_NNS ,_, ''_'' say_VB Steven_NNP B._NNP Enright_NNP ,_, a_DT New_NNP York_NNP financial_JJ planner_NN with_IN Seidman_NNP Financial_NNP Services_NNPS ._.
As_IN a_DT result_NN ,_, financial_JJ advisers_NNS say_VB they_PRP take_VB several_JJ steps_NNS when_WRB evaluate_VB the_DT riskiness_NN of_IN clients_NNS '_POS portfolios_NNS ._.
They_PRP estimate_VB the_DT return_NN a_DT person_NN 's_POS current_JJ portfolio_NN be_VB likely_JJ to_TO generate_VB over_IN time_NN ,_, along_IN with_IN a_DT standard_JJ deviation_NN that_WDT suggest_VB how_WRB much_JJ the_DT return_NN will_MD vary_VB year_NN by_IN year_NN ._.
They_PRP try_VB to_TO figure_VB out_RP the_IN long-term_JJ results_NNS the_DT person_NN need_VB to_TO meet_VB major_JJ goals_NNS ._.
And_CC they_PRP eyeball_NN types_NNS of_IN risk_NN that_WDT be_VB not_RB easily_RB quantify_VB ._.
The_DT portfolios_NNS of_IN two_CD hypothetical_JJ families_NNS ,_, one_CD a_DT couple_NN at_IN retirement_NN age_NN and_CC another_DT a_DT two-income_JJ couple_NN at_IN age_NN 45_CD ,_, illustrate_VB several_JJ types_NNS of_IN risk_NN that_IN investors_NNS need_VB to_TO consider_VB ._.
For_IN instance_NN ,_, the_DT insure_VB municipal_JJ bonds_NNS that_WDT dominate_VB the_DT older_JJR couple_NN 's_POS portfolio_NN be_VB probably_RB select_VB in_IN large_JJ part_NN for_IN their_PRP$ low_JJ repayment_NN risk_NN ._.
But_CC they_PRP expose_VB the_DT holders_NNS to_TO a_DT lot_NN of_IN inflation_NN risk_NN and_CC interest-rate_NN risk_NN ._.
The_DT younger_JJR couple_NN 's_POS stockholdings_NNS involve_VB more_JJR risk_NN than_IN a_DT diversified_JJ stock_NN portfolio_NN because_IN the_DT bulk_NN of_IN the_DT money_NN be_VB in_IN a_DT single_JJ issue_NN ._.
Note_VB that_IN the_DT younger_JJR couple_NN 's_POS portfolio_NN have_VB a_DT higher_JJR expect_VB annual_JJ return_NN ,_, 10.1_CD %_NN vs._IN 8.8_CD %_NN ,_, as_IN calculate_VB by_IN Seidman_NNP Financial_NNP Services_NNPS ,_, which_WDT be_VB the_DT financial-planning_JJ affiliate_NN of_IN BDO_NNP Seidman_NNP ._.
That_DT largely_RB reflect_VB the_DT heavy_JJ stockholdings_NNS ._.
But_CC one_CD price_NN pay_VB for_IN the_DT higher_JJR expect_VB return_NN be_VB greater_RBR short-term_JJ volatility_NN ,_, as_IN reflect_VB in_IN the_DT higher_JJR standard_JJ deviation_NN that_IN Seidman_NNP estimates_NNS for_IN the_DT younger_JJR couple_NN 's_POS portfolio_NN ._.
-LRB-_( Here_RB 's_POS how_WRB to_TO interpret_VB a_DT standard_JJ deviation_NN figure_NN :_: Take_VB the_DT expect_VB return_NN and_CC add_VB one_CD standard_JJ deviation_NN to_TO it_PRP ._.
Then_RB take_VB the_DT expect_VB return_NN and_CC subtract_VB one_CD standard_JJ deviation_NN ._.
In_IN two_CD of_IN three_CD years_NNS ,_, the_DT actual_JJ result_NN should_MD fall_VB within_IN that_DT range_NN if_IN all_PDT the_DT assumptions_NNS be_VB accurate_JJ ._.

``_`` A_DT day_NN of_IN reckoning_NN be_VB come_VB where_WRB we_PRP think_VB the_DT market_NN will_MD place_VB a_DT high_JJ premium_NN on_IN the_DT highest-quality_JJ debt_NN issues_NNS ,_, and_CC therefore_RB we_PRP think_VB the_DT best_JJS debt_NN investment_NN be_VB U.S._NNP government_NN bonds_NNS ,_, ''_'' say_VB Craig_NNP Corcoran_NNP of_IN Davis\/Zweig_NNP Futures_NNP Inc._NNP ,_, an_DT investment_NN advisory_JJ firm_NN ._.

A_DT pickup_NN truck_NN drive_VB by_IN a_DT white_JJ farmer_NN rumble_VB past_JJ with_IN a_DT load_NN of_IN black_JJ workers_NNS bounce_VB in_IN the_DT back_RB ._.

The_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS --_: who_WP take_VB their_PRP$ name_NN from_IN William_NNP of_IN Orange_NNP of_IN the_DT Netherlands_NNP ,_, a_DT hero_NN of_IN the_DT Dutch-descended_JJ Afrikaners_NNPS --_: believe_VB that_IN the_DT solution_NN to_TO South_NNP Africa_NNP 's_POS racial_JJ problems_NNS be_VB n't_RB the_DT abolition_NN of_IN apartheid_NN ,_, it_PRP 's_VB the_DT perfection_NN of_IN apartheid_NN --_: complete_JJ and_CC total_JJ separation_NN of_IN the_DT races_NNS ._.

The_DT Orange_NNP Workers_NNPS be_VB just_RB put_VB this_DT preaching_NN into_IN practice_NN ._.

2_CD ._. Even_RB where_WRB the_DT Fed_NNP do_VB not_RB share_VB this_DT view_NN it_PRP felt_VB the_DT need_NN to_TO accommodate_VB to_TO it_PRP ._.

Thanks_NNS largely_RB to_TO the_DT continue_VB growth_NN of_IN the_DT U.S._NNP economy_NN ,_, the_DT poverty_NN rate_NN be_VB now_RB substantially_RB lower_JJR than_IN the_DT 1983_CD peak_NN of_IN 15.3_CD %_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT improvements_NNS have_VB be_VB modest_JJ in_IN the_DT past_JJ couple_NN of_IN years_NNS ._.

If_IN it_PRP be_VB n't_RB for_IN Social_NNP Security_NNP payments_NNS ,_, more_JJR than_IN three_CD times_NNS as_IN many_JJ elderly_NN would_MD be_VB below_IN the_DT poverty_NN line_NN ,_, Mr._NNP Butz_NNP say_VB ._.
The_DT Census_NNP Bureau_NNP also_RB say_VB :_:
